meanings.definition: A system of sending mail by aircraft for faster delivery.
meanings.sent1: The airmails arrived quickly from far away.
meanings.sent2: I always use airmails when I need to send something fast.
meanings.sent3: The airmails were like speedy messengers in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him flew through the airmails, reaching him in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The airmails zipped through the clouds, delivering joy to many.

meanings.definition: The letters, packages, etc. sent by airmail.
meanings.sent1: She received a package through the airmails yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The airmails brought news from across the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The airmails carried surprises in their wings.
meanings.sent4: His words traveled through the airmails, bringing comfort to her heart.
meanings.sent5: The airmails carried stories of hope and love to distant lands.

meanings.sent1: I will airmail the documents to you tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She airmails gifts to her family during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: He airmails his jokes to friends, making them laugh from afar.
meanings.sent4: The memories were airmailed to her heart, filling it with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The important message was airmailed urgently, reaching its destination in no time.
